燻字的基本解释

燻
xūn
同“熏1”①②。

燻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xūn］
［《廣韻》許云切，平文，曉。］
亦作“燻1”。亦作“爋1”。
(1)火烟；火烟上出。
(2)烧灼，火烫。
(3)引申指拒绝。参见“熏人”。
(4)用火烟熏炙。
(5)熏制；焙制。
(6)侵染。
(7)指逐渐积累。
(8)用言语逐渐影响、说服人。
(9)通“曛”。参见“熏夕”。
(10)通“纁”。绛色。参见“熏裳”。
(11)用同“薰”。
(12)用同“釁”。以香料涂身。
[②]［xùn］
亦作“爋2”。
(1)谓窒息中毒。
(2)谓名声恶劣，尽人皆知。

燻字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燻； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页685第29
【廣韻】許云切，音勳。同熏。【列子·湯問篇】燻則煙上。【集韻】熏，俗作燻。非是。　又【集韻】吁運切，音訓。【庾肩吾詩】柏燻起㕑文。

考證：〔【列子·殷湯篇】燻則煙上。〕　謹照原書改湯問篇。

xūn

smoke
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xūn］
["Guangyun" Xu Yunqie, Pingwen, Xiao. ]
Also known as "Smoked 1". Also known as "爋1".
(1) Fire smoke; fire smoke comes out.
(2) Burning and burning.
(3) The extension refers to rejection. See "Xunren".
(4) Smoke it with fire.
(5) Smoked; roasted.
(6) Infection.
(7) Refers to gradual accumulation.
(8) Use words to influence and persuade people gradually.
(9) Through "曛". See "Xun Xi".
(10) Through "纁". Crimson. See "Xun Shang".
(11) Use the same as "Xun".
(12) Use the same as "provoke". Coat the body with spices.
[②]［xùn］
Also known as "爋2".
(1) Said suffocation poisoning.
(2) The reputation is bad and everyone knows.
smoke
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　 Xun; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 685 29
[Guang Yun] Xu Yunqi, Yin Xun. Same smoked. 【Liezi·Tangwen Chapter】Smoothing will lead to smoke. [Jiyun] Smoked, commonly used for smoked. No.　[Jiyun] Yuyun cut, sound training. 【Yu Jian Wu Poem】Bai Xun Qi Wen. Textual research: [【Liezi·Yin Tang Pian】Smoked up when smoked. 〕　I would like to change the Tang Wen chapter according to the original book.
